channel.title: Settings on WETHOD / Learning Center
channel.description: Recent content in Settings on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Settings
item.description: Tutorial From here you can access a quick and clear tutorial that will teach you all the secrets behind WETHOD, but remember: with great power comes great responsibility. Clicking on “let me try” will pause the tutorial and let you take a look around, to resume the tutorial just click on the bottom right button. Clicking on “skip tour” will close the tutorial. Account Here you set your name, surnameÂ and password.
